== Table of PS3 Related Packages ==

WORK IN PROGRESS

On this page we'll attempt document all PS3 specific or related packages. This is to create a view of the software the PS3 Port team need to care for. I realise this will get out of date quickly so we'll need to look for an automatic report later. But for now I think this is useful. (munckfish)

| 2.17cvs20070401-0ubuntu1
| <#CCCCCC> Obsolete in Intrepid
| This package is obsolete. The Cell patches have been included upstream. The core Ubuntu binutils source in Intrepid now outputs a special binutils-spu package on powerpc. However it does not provide for cross building on x86 like the old package did. Need to take this issue up with the toolchain team.
